A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel like this movie is a massive missed opportunity. I can respect that the Director had a unique vision for his Star Wars movie thought I feel like he completely threw away all the story lines JJ Abrams had built up in The Force Awakens. I enjoyed Kylo Ren and Rey much more in this film though in the end the story left much to be desired and I feel like the director\, Rian Johnson\, has seen the films that this one is supposed to be based on since the recurring characters do not act like themselves.
